A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It learns absolutely nothing from VII's mistakes.

Everyone tries to pretend that the Force Awakens was flawless\, which is untrue. I know many who've seen the film and admit it wasn't perfect. Rather aggravatingly\, the biggest weakness for The Last Jedi is that it's too predictable. And every other minor thing I didn't see coming I found myself asking what even was the point in granting that. Any other details I share would delve into spoilers\, so I'd do both of us a favour and not mention them. The twists are too nonsensical anyway.

Long story short\, I watched it with low hopes and came out exactly the same. Don't bother watching IX\, you've already seen it in 1983.
